titles: A proclamation commanding all papists or reputed papists, forthwith to depart from the cities of London and Westminster, and from within ten miles of the same
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Newmarket the fourth day of October 1680. In the two and Thirtieth-year of our reign.
